channel.title: Max cash commands
channel.description:
Is there any command that could help me with max cash.
All i want is admins/mods to have the command ::maxcash
Does anyone have a code for it?
Please and thank you

item.title: Max cash commands
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Put if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxcash") && playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, Integer.MAX_VALUE); } in client.java. Tip: seek yell, that should are something like this: [code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (combat > 49) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);

          } if (combat < 50) {
            sendMessage("You need a combat level of 50 in order to use the yell command.");
    }

}[/code] Then type an enter after the last }, and then insert the code. Then it looks like this: [code]else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (combat > 49) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5);

          } if (combat < 50) {
            sendMessage("You need a combat level of 50 in order to use the yell command.");
    }

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“maxcash”) && playerRights >= 1)) {
addItem(995, Integer.MAX_VALUE);
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Max cash commands
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

To add the command just go into client.java find a command… eg. search for “master” then on the top of it put: if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxcash") && playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, 2147000000); }

or if your max cash is 999m do: if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxcash") && playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, 999999999); }

or just type in the addItem(995, *cash amount*);

Read full topic

item.title: Max cash commands
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Stabios11, post:6, topic:271326”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=358060.msg2734518#msg2734518 date=1238969746]

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxcash") && playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, 2147000000); }

Or if your max cash is 999m.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxcash") && playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, 999999999); }

He wants max cash, not close-to-max cash.
If he wanted that he would have said so. The Soul’s works fine.
[/quote]
Yeah max cash in most server max cash is 214700000 (2147M)[/quote]No… max cash in ALL servers (unless somebody tries to edit the int to a long) is 2147483647

Read full topic
